pageContext.public_note:
New client Fall 2019

Paid for through a grant.  May not be the same kids each week.  Will be running another program in the Spring, which you will likely teach so keep track of your curriculum.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Build and program robots using the LEGO® Mindstorms NXT system! Learn about mechanical and software design, loops, conditional statements, problem solving, and teamwork skills. Work in small groups, program and build your robot, and rise to the challenge. Control the robot to avoid obstacles, pick up and carry objects, and play sounds. Projects are structured so that students work in an open-ended, investigative environment while having fun.
pageContext.course_type_name: Robotics using the LEGO® NXT System
